summary: THE VEHICLE CONTINUED TO RUN OUT OF GAS.  WHEN THE VEHICLE WARMED UP, IT SHUT OFF.  THE CONSUMER FELT THE FUEL PUMP WAS DEFECTIVE.   *NLM   THE FUEL PUMP WAS REPLACED. A GRINDING NOISE HAD COME FROM THE REAR OF THE TRUCK.  THE PINION GEAR HAD GONE  BAD.  THE ENTIRE REAR END WAS REPLACED AND THE 20K MILES LATER WAS REPLACED AGAIN.  (THE SAME PROBLEM)   *SCC      *JB
